languages.text: Именно Гордею Скатову была доверена честь руководить реставрацией статуи Богу-Императору.
The honour of leading the restoration of the statue of the God-Emperor was bestowed upon none other than Gordei Skatov.
languages.original_text: Именно Гордею Скатову была доверена честь руководить реставрацией статуи Богу-Императору.

traits.locale_text: The honour of leading the restoration of the statue of the God-Emperor was bestowed to none other than Gordei Skatov.

languages.text: 有幸负责指挥神皇雕像修复工程的人不是别人，正是戈尔代·斯卡托夫。
languages.original_text: The honour of leading the restoration of the statue of the God-Emperor was bestowed upon none other than Gordei Skatov.

traits.locale_text: 有幸负责指挥神皇雕像修复工程的人不是别人，正是戈尔代·斯卡托夫。

languages.text: Die Ehre, die Restauration der Statue des Gottimperators anzuführen, fiel niemand Geringerem als Gordei Skatov zu.
languages.original_text: The honour of leading the restoration of the statue of the God-Emperor was bestowed upon none other than Gordei Skatov.

traits.locale_text: Die Ehre, die Restauration der Statue des Gottimperators anzuführen, fiel niemand Geringerem als Gordei Skatov zu.

languages.text: L'honneur de diriger la restauration de la statue de l'Empereur-Dieu fut accordé à nul autre que Gordei Skatov.
languages.original_text: The honour of leading the restoration of the statue of the God-Emperor was bestowed upon none other than Gordei Skatov.

traits.locale_text: L'honneur de diriger la restauration de la statue de l’Empereur-Dieu fut accordé à nul autre que Gordei Skatov.

languages.text: El honor de liderar la restauración de la estatua del Dios Emperador recayó nada más y nada menos que sobre Gordei Skatov.
languages.original_text: The honour of leading the restoration of the statue of the God-Emperor was bestowed upon none other than Gordei Skatov.

traits.locale_text: El honor de liderar la restauración de la estatua del Dios Emperador recayó nada más y nada menos que sobre Gordei Skatov.

languages.text: 神帝陛下の像の修復を指揮するという栄誉は、他ならぬゴーディ・スカトフに与えられた。
languages.original_text: The honour of leading the restoration of the statue of the God-Emperor was bestowed upon none other than Gordei Skatov.

traits.locale_text: 神帝陛下の像の修復を指揮するという栄誉は、他ならぬゴーディ・スカトフに与えられた。

languages.text: Tanrı İmparator'un heykelinin onarımına liderlik etme onuru, Gordei Skatov'a verildi.
languages.original_text: The honour of leading the restoration of the statue of the God-Emperor was bestowed upon none other than Gordei Skatov.

traits.locale_text: Tanrı İmparator'un heykelinin onarımına liderlik etme onuru Gordei Skatov'a verildi.
